data.name: Admiralty of Kul'Tiras
data.description:
The Alliance - Admiralty of Kul'Tiras [R]
Units:
+2 armor

Buildings:
Improved main building Auras

Upgrades:
-5% cost
+1 start Amulet of Vitality level

Magic:
Tidal Weight (Slows enemy unit by 20%)
Water Bomb (Deals 150 dmg to a unit after 5s)
Tidal Burst (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Kul'Tiras is deeply connected with the sea, so even in ground battles they rely on their knowledge of sea power. Admiralty is akin to a wave, the more power they gain against their foes, the higher they will rise

Difficulty: Advanced
Created: by Snupi

auras.name: Fierce Sea Aura
auras.description:
+2 HP/s unit regeneration, -15% dmg reduction
x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(doesn't affect enemy Special unit)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Admiral's Inspiration
auras.description:
+15% attack rate, +4 armor to units
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Cannon Expertise
auras.description:
-8 armor, +150 range and +20% dmg
(affects your buildings)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Trained Knights [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Reinforced Blade
(+1 start level)

Knight replaces Guardsman
Siege Unit
+150 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Swift Strikes (Passive Skill)
(15% chance to attack twice)
Upgrades used:
Kultiras Sword
Marine Armor
Heavy Armor
Mighty Swing

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Veteran Rifleman [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Piercing Cartridge
(+1 start level)

Veteran Rifleman replaces Rifleman
Range Unit
+10 damage
+75 HP
Abilities:
Bleed (Orb Effect)
(25% for 10 dmg/s, -4 armor for 6s)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Marine Armor
Piercing Cartridge
Healing Hand

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Royal Guards [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Steel Linings
(+1 start level)

Royal Guards replaces Footman
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Incredible Agility (Passive Skill)
(10% to dodge an attack)
Mighty Strike (Passive Skill)
(every 8th attack deals 50 extra dmg)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Kultiras Sword
Marine Armor
Heavy Armor
Healing Hand
Prediction

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Water Power [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Heavy Armor
+1 level of Healing Hand

Reduces spell damage to Footman, Guardsman and Flibuster by 30% and increases HP by 50 and armor by 2

Type: Anti Magic Damage / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Air Support [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Amulet of Vitality

Spawn 1 Airship every 2 wave
Abilities:
Cargo Compartment (Support Aura)
(Amulet of Vitality restores +1 charge in 500 AoE)
Start Kit (Support Spell)
(+2 charges to units in 500 AoE)
(can be used only once)
(works even if Innate Skill is not researched yet)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Marine Armor

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Dwarven Mechanisms [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Experimental Rounds
(+1 start level)

Ground Machine replaces Cannoneer Team
Siege Unit (Range)
+55% attack rate
+800 HP
Abilities:
Driver Cleric (Summoning Spell)
(resurrects 2 friendly units)
(60 seconds cooldown)
Holy Aura (Support Aura)
(+4 HP/sec bonus regeneration)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Marine Armor
Experimental Rounds

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Ironforge Mercenaries [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Stunning Powder
(+1 start level)

Dwarf Mercenary replaces Flibuster
Air Unit
-200 HP
Abilities:
Large Caliber (Damage Spell)
(400 damage to Air unit)
Imported Weapons (Passive Skill)
(Stunning Powder is 100% more effective)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Marine Armor
Stunning Powder
Heavy Armor

Type: Air Power / Anti Air

bonuses.name: Fleet Medics [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Power Stone
(+1 start level)

Fleet Medics replaces Sorcerer
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Water Missile (Passive Skill)
(deals 40 dmg to 1/2/3/4 targets)
(50% chance upon casting any ability)
Dispel Magic (Disable Spell)
(dispels buffs in 175 AoE)
(restores 10/20/30/40 mana)
Upgrades used:
Sea Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Marine Armor
Power Stone
Healing Hand

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [X]
bonuses.description:
Increases Castle and Sorcerer mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Castle spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.name: Storage Stone
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Castle mana reg

upgrades.name: Empowerment
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Sorcerer damage
-10% Sorcerer spell cooldown
Tidal Weight -10 mana cost, -5% AS and MS
Water Bomb +50 damage
Tidal Burst +25 damage

upgrades.name: Arcane Powder
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+5% building attack rate
+15 Cannon Turret damage
+15 Barracks damage
+20 Castle damage

bonuses.name: Anduin [Q]
bonuses.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Hybrid (Tank/Support)

Can learn:
Holy Light (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units
(25 second cooldown)

Heavy Shield (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

To me Guards! (Sumonning Spell)
summons 3 King's Guards for 30-60 sec
(60-30 second cooldown)

Stand as One! (Support Spell)
40-100 HP/sec, 6-12 bonus armor to units for 10s
(Anduin gets +20 armor during this)
(900 area of effect)
(60 second cooldown)

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Expeditions [C]
bonuses.description:
The world still holds many dangers, which can be either worth the risk, or be our doom

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Expeditions
spells.description:
Sending an expedition in a specific direction may reward you with extra benefit, but beware, every expedition needs their own funds to complete the journey

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Exploring South
spells.description:
Spend 250 Gold
40% chance to get 750 Gold
(1 min 30s cd)

spells.name: Exploring North
spells.description:
Spend 300 Gold
30% chance to refresh abilities in Harbor
(2 min cd)

spells.name: Exploring East
spells.description:
Spend 500 Gold
20% chance to gain 1 Army Upgrade at random
(2 min 30s cd)

spells.name: Exploring West
spells.description:
Spend 1000 Gold
34% chance to gain 1-4 random Artefact
(3 min cd)

spells.name: Reinforcements
spells.description: Summon 4 Royal Guards, 2 Veteran Rifleman

spells.name: Healing Totem
spells.description:
Your chosen unit will immediately summon Healing Ward
Restores 9 HP/sec for 10 sec

spells.name: Stored Sea Fog
spells.description:
Your chosen unit will immediately cast Stored Fog
30% chance to miss in 600 AoE for 20 sec

spells.name: Dwafr Mine
spells.description:
Your chosen unit will immediately summon Dwarf Mine
Deals 500 damage in 700 AoE. Lasts 5 min

spells.name: Exploring West
spells.description:

34% chance to gain 1-4 random Artefact
(3 min cd)

spells.name: Dwafr Mine
spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Steel Linings
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: blocks 30 dmg
Affects: Footman
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 4 max charges
Lv2: Spawns with 6 max charges
Lv3: Spawns with 8 max charges
Lv4: Spawns with 10 max charges

towerUpgrades.name: Stunning Powder
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 75 damage and 2 sec stun each attack
Affects: Flibuster
(has half duration on Heroes)
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 4 max charges
Lv2: Spawns with 6 max charges
Lv3: Spawns with 8 max charges
Lv4: Spawns with 10 max charges

towerUpgrades.name: Power Stone
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: Empowers magic each cast
Affects: Sorcerer
(+1 target for Tidal Weight)
(+1 target for Water Bomb)
(+50 AoE for Tidal Burst)
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 1 max charge
Lv2: Spawns with 2 max charge
Lv3: Spawns with 3 max charge
Lv4: Spawns with 4 max charge

towerUpgrades.name: Amulet of Vitality
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: replenish unit ammunition every 15 seconds
Affects: All Units
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Restores 1 charge
Lv2: Restores 2 charge
Lv3: Restores 3 charge
Lv4: Restores 4 charge

towerUpgrades.name: Experimental Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus effect each attack
Affects: Cannoneer Team
(Also increases stun chance for Cannon Turret)
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 1 max charge, 15% for 0.5s stun
Lv2: Spawns with 2 max charge, 30% for 1s stun
Lv3: Spawns with 3 max charge, 45% for 1.5s stun
Lv4: Spawns with 4 max charge, 60% for 2s stun

towerUpgrades.name: Healing Hand
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: healing ability
Affects: Footman, Rifleman and Sorcerer
(25 sec cooldown)

Lv1: heals 40 HP
Lv2: heals 70 HP
Lv3: heals 100 HP
Lv4: heals 130 HP

spells.name: Healing Hand (Lv1)
spells.description: Heals 40 hit points.

towerUpgrades.name: Heavy Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor, HP bonus and attack rate
Affects: Footman, Guardsman and Flibuster

Lv1: +40 HP, +2 armor, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +65 HP, +4 armor, +8% attack rate
Lv3: +90 HP, +6 armor, +11% attack rate
Lv4: +115 HP, +8 armor, +14% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Piercing Cartridge
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 3x damage each attack
Affects: Rifleman
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 4 max charges
Lv2: Spawns with 6 max charges
Lv3: Spawns with 8 max charges
Lv4: Spawns with 10 max charges

towerUpgrades.name: Reinforced Blade
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 30 dmg in 175 AoE each attack
Affects: Guardsman
(Innate Skill)

Lv1: Spawns with 4 max charges
Lv2: Spawns with 6 max charges
Lv3: Spawns with 8 max charges
Lv4: Spawns with 10 max charges

skills.description:
15% chance for 0.5 sec stun
(does not affect Special unit)

heroes.name: Commander
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Crucial Hit (Passive Skill)
18-36% to deal extra 200-800 dmg, stun for 0.3s
(does not affect Special unit)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
8-20% to evade an attack

Might of the Seas (Orb Effect)
15-27% chance to deal 100 dmg in a line
(400 wave distance)

skills.name: Thunder Clap - [Level 4]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AHtc,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by <AHtc,DataC4,%>% and attack rate by <AHtc,DataD4,%>%.

heroes.name: Grand Admiral
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Shockwave (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Thrill of Battle (Passive Skill)
10-28% area damage, +10-28% attack rate

Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
13-25% to evade an attack

skills.name: Shockwave - [Level 4]
skills.description: A wave of force that ripples outward, causing <AOsh,DataA4> damage to land units in a line.

skills.name: Cleaving Attack - [Level 4]
skills.description: The Hero strikes with such force that <ANca,DataA4,%>% of his damage strikes through to enemies near the primary attacked unit.

heroes.name: Lord-Admiral
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Blizzard (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Fear Aura (Disable Aura)
10-40% dmg reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Thick Fog (Disable Spell)
15-27% AS slow in an area for 20 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(60 second cooldown)

Tsunami (Damage Spell)
150-300 damage in 3 lines
(750-900 wave distance)
(100 second cooldown)

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down freezing ice shards which deal 300 damage to units in an area.

skills.name: Overload - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases attack rate of mechanical units by 15%.

skills.name: Crushing Wave - [Level 1]
skills.description: Sends a gigantic wave which deals 250 damage to each enemy land unit in a line.

heroes.name: Kul'Tiran Flagship
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Metal Platings (Passive Skill)
block 20-50 damage

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
10-40% damage bonus

Overclocked (Self Spell)
12-30% attack rate bonus
(give +25 MP/reg sec)
(60 second cooldown)

Fire All Guns! (Orb Effect)
180-300 dmg in a line,stuns 1-4 sec
(250 mana costs)
(enemies dying in 400 AoE give 25 mana)
(500 wave distance)

skills.name: Overcharge - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases the attack rate by 12%. Lasts 20 seconds.

heroes.name: King of the Alliance
heroes.description:

Strong Vs Heroes

skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Dark Spirit - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Demon for 60 seconds.
Gives a 5% chance to avoid an attack.
Gives a 15% chance to do 2.5 times normal damage on an attack.

skills.name: Tranquility - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Causes rains of healing energy to pour down in a large area, healing friendly allied units for 60 hit points per second.
Lasts 10 seconds.
